mobamputation.config.prop.gibTime.name: Gib live time
mobamputation.config.prop.blood.name: Blood Effects
mobamputation.config.prop.gibChance.name: Gibbing Chance
mobamputation.config.prop.gibTime.commen: Length of time gibs can live (entirely)
Length of time gibs can live once they hit the ground
mobamputation.config.prop.bloodCount.com: Amount of blood particles spawned per gib
mobamputation.config.prop.bloodSplurt.co: Should blood splurt out from the wound of the gib?
mobamputation.config.prop.greenBlood.com: Should blood be green instead of red?
mobamputation.config.prop.gibPushing.com: Do gibs actively push mobs in its path?
Should mobs without heads take massive damage?
mobamputation.config.prop.gibChance.comm: Chance that mobs will gib.\nOnly when Tool Effect is off.
mobamputation.config.prop.projectileList:
Additional projectiles which affects gibbing.
Default chance is 100%

<EntityName OR ClassName>: <Chance out of 100>, <EntityName OR ClassName>, <EntityName OR ClassName> etc

EG:"Arrow: 100, Snowball: 50, net.minecraft.entity.EntityWhatever: 75"
mobamputation.config.prop.allowProjectil: Allow projectiles that cause damage to mobs to gib?
